features: ORGANIC COTTON: Our Highly Absorbent Organic Tampons are made of 100% organic cotton only. Natural tampons with ultra-absorbent cores and cover to prevent fibers and nasty filaments from falling apart inside your body. They’re safe, non toxic tampons and chemical-free.
WIDTH EXPANSION - No leaks as our organic tampons expand width-wise to fit all bodies.

COMFORTABLE AND EASY: Because of their soft round end-tip, our individual tampons are comfortable and easy to insert. Simply take your tampon, twist the top in the opposite direction of the bottom, and push!

GENTLE ON SKIN: Our super, regular and super-plus tampons are specially made for sensitive skin. Vegan, dye-free, and fragrance-free, these tampons are gentle yet effective heavy periods solutions designed with every woman in mind

EARTH-FRIENDLY & SUSTAINABLE: Compared to other tampons on the market, our tampons are better for the environment. Apart from being made completely of organic cotton, each tampon is wrapped in recycled paper and packed in a tube

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Each tampon is made purely of organic cotton, inside and out! It has an ultra-absorbent core and cover that keeps nasty filaments from remaining inside your body. Because of their soft round end-tip, our individual tampons are comfortable and easy to insert. Simply take your tampon, twist the top in the opposite direction of the bottom, and push! Our tampons are made of 100% organic cotton. They have ultra-absorbent cores with covers to prevent fibers and nasty filaments from falling apart inside your body. They’re non-toxic and chemical-free.

Our super, regular and super-plus tampons are specially made for sensitive skin. Vegan, dye-free, and fragrance-free, these tampons are gentle yet effective heavy periods solutions designed with every woman in mind. Compared to other tampons on the market, our travel tampons are better for the environment. Apart from being made completely of organic cotton, each tampon is wrapped in recycled paper and packed in a tube or jute bag. Our super, regular and super-plus tampons are specially made for sensitive skin. Vegan, dye-free, and fragrance-free, these tampons are gentle yet effective heavy periods solutions designed with every woman in mind.

Organic Sanitary Pads Menstrual Cup Organic Panty Liners 100% Certified-Organic Cotton ✓ ✓ Chemical-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ Made without synthetic fibers, SAP, fragrance, dyes, or chlorine bleach ✓ ✓ ✓ Size/Count Day, Overnight, and Mixed (10 and 20 Counts) Medium and Large 48 and 24 Count Vegan, Sustainable, Plastic-free ✓ ✓ ✓ Ultra thin for everyday wear ✓ ✓ GOTS and ICEA Certified ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for me
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Tampon Tribe Certified Organic Tampons with Applicator, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase! They truly have exceeded my expectations in every way.The fact that they are certified organic and hypoallergenic is a huge plus for me. I have sensitive skin, and I've had issues with irritation and discomfort in the past with other tampon brands.(also, when I researched, I realized others were not truly organic) …with Tampon Tribe, I've had no such issues! That makes them my best choice.The applicator design is easy to use, comfortable, and ensures that the tampon goes in smoothly without any discomfort! So important!! I've used tampons with flimsy applicators in the past, and it's a world of difference to have a sturdy, reliable one like this.The Tampon Tribe tampons are also super absorbent. I’m confident I’ll be dry with them. I also appreciate that they come in different absorbency options, for my needs of the moment.I noticed some negative reviews here, but I wanted to share my positive experience to offer a more balanced perspective. It's important to remember that everyone's body is different, and what works for one person may not work for another. That said, I believe that these Tampon Tribe tampons are definitely worth trying.For a reliable, organic, and hypoallergenic option, I highly recommend giving these tampons a chance. They’ve given me peace of mind. ** Plus, the environmental benefits of using eco-friendly products are an added bonus. If you’re on the fence, I wouldn’t hesitate to give them a go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: Not bad, but not great. The super has low adsorption, it felt like a regular. I usually have a short cycle with only the first day being the heaviest. I probably won't buy again.....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Missing essential parts
reviews.reviewText: One tampon had no string. One tampon was missing from the applicator. Not even done with the pack, but at this rate I expect one or two more to be defective.. Love the bag, but not good to leave out parts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Organic tampons, 100% cotton that haven’t been exposed to pesticides, dyes, and toxins. Amazing product! And they have cute packaging!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome - but order directly from their site!
reviews.reviewText: Tried these a year ago ... Haven't looked back. Love that the cotton is natural, without dyes or additives. (I don't need my tampons smelling like roses!) They also have FANTASTIC CUSTOMER SERVICE!Like lots of people mention, I had an issue figuring out the applicator. It would "get stuck" and I'd have to throw the thing away. But I wrote to them about it and they sent a link to a short video explaining how to rotate the applicator to "unlock" it. (Plus they offered to replace the tampons I'd wasted in the process!)The video made all the difference. It's easy once you've done it a few times.I will say that if you are accustomed to plastic applicators, these take a bit of getting used to. Sometimes, I like to "test" it by pushing the tampon out just a centimeter to feel that it slides easily, before inserting. That tiny extra moment of mindfulness is worth it to me to eliminate my use of plastic applicators.I love the minimal packaging as well. They really are dedicated to sustainability and eliminating extra or harmful materials.And I appreciate how I can customize not just how many of which absorbency I get in my package, but how often too (like every 2 mos if you don't need new ones *every* month).Also, I get pretty heavy flow the first couple of days, and I use the extra super for that. And they work great. The "regular" works kind of like the light tampons from companies like tampax. So keep that in mind. "Size up," so to speak.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These Tampons are seriously the best!
reviews.reviewText: It's so comforting to know I'm using such a safe product for me and the environment! Unlike other natural tampons I've used in the past these actually work and don't leak. They're also WAY more comfortable than any of the other brands I've tried. Sticking with TT for life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love concept, design needs help
reviews.reviewText: Applicator sticks making them awkward to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are seriously the best tampons! I love the company in general- focused ...
reviews.reviewText: These are seriously the best tampons! I love the company in general- focused on making tampons that are not only good for your body, but also the environment. The tampons are also really comfortable and super absorbent.
